titleStmt.title: Observations on a paper intituled, The declaration of the Lord Petre upon his death, touching the plot in a letter to His Most Sacred Majesty : being a full answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Care, Henry, 1646-1688.
Petre, William Petre, Baron, 1622-1684.

notesStmt.note: The letter of Lord Petre to His Most Sacred Majesty is included. Care's Observations consist of comments on the various parts of the letter.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
